pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, October 16, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, October 16, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend a National Caucus meeting.

Stouffville, Ontario  

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister, the Minister of Finance, Bill Morneau, and the Minister of Small Business and Tourism, Bardish Chagger, will make an announcement followed by a media availability.

Pastaggio Italian Eatery
6211 Main Street
Stouffville, ON

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:45 a.m.

Ottawa, Ontario 

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Diwali on the Hill reception and deliver brief remarks. 

Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street
Ottawa, ON

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:45 p.m.
